title: Get to know
more about me
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer. I have a passion for building innovative solutions, exercise, and entrepreneurship. As the co-founder of Scholarvy, I am excited about our journey and the potential for growth. We are currently seeking seed investment.

items.title: Sport Scholarship
items.description: Got a scholarship to study and represent my university in Tae Kwon Do in national and international competitions.

items.title: Scholarvy Pre-seed Support
items.description: Won $150,000 MX in pre-seed support from the Nuevo Le√≥n's government.

items.title: Scholarvy IFE Accelerator
items.description: Selected to participate in the IFE Accelerator program. Going to Silicon Valley soon for seed investment.
